duties_responsibilities.duty: Review medical records to abstract ICD-10 codes that map to HCCs from a variety of different CMS Hierarchy models including Medicare Advantage, PACE, Commercial, and Medicaid CDPS model.
Audit medical records and validate entries that have been submitted to CMS.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 5 years of medical coding experience with at least 1 year of HCC coding experience. Coding certifications accepted are CPC, CCS, CRC, RHIA, RHIT only.
